sentences.en: a brief description of the film
sentences.cn: 影片的简短介绍

sentences.en: A brief rummage will provide several pairs of gloves.
sentences.cn: 稍微翻翻，就能找到几双手套。

sentences.en: A brief, hand-written postscript lay beneath his signature.
sentences.cn: 在他的签名下，有一句简短的手写附言。

sentences.en: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.cn: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

sentences.en: A guide gives a brief talk on the history of the site.
sentences.cn: 导游简要地介绍了那个遗址的历史。

sentences.en: After a brief rally the shares returned to 126p.
sentences.cn: 经过短暂的反弹后，股价回落到了126便士。

sentences.en: For a few brief minutes we forgot the anxiety and anguish.
sentences.cn: 短短几分钟我们就忘记了焦虑与苦恼。

sentences.en: He gave a brief splutter of laughter.
sentences.cn: 他干笑了几声。

sentences.en: He gave her a brief, brotherly kiss.
sentences.cn: 他像兄长般轻吻了她一下。

sentences.en: He let out a brief cackle.
sentences.cn: 他咯咯一笑。

sentences.en: He made a brief, unexpected appearance at the office.
sentences.cn: 他出乎意料地在办公室露了一下脸。

sentences.en: He trained his gun down and loosed a brief burst.
sentences.cn: 他用枪瞄准下面后，砰砰射出一串子弹。

sentences.en: I hold no brief for dishonest policemen.
sentences.cn: 我不为不诚实的警察辩护。

sentences.en: In brief, take no risks.
sentences.cn: 总之，不能冒险。

sentences.en: It was unfair to judge her on such a brief acquaintanceship.
sentences.cn: 你刚认识她就对她作出评价，这是不公平的。

sentences.en: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.cn: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.en: Mirella approached him and, after a brief hesitation, shook his hand.
sentences.cn: 米雷拉走近他，犹豫片刻后，和他握了握手。

sentences.en: The ACLU filed a brief (=  gave one to the court  ) opposing the decision.
sentences.cn: 美国公民自由联盟提交了辩护状反对这个判决。

sentences.en: The president read a brief statement to reporters before boarding his plane.
sentences.cn: 总统登机前向记者宣读了一篇简短的声明。

sentences.en: The radio message was brief.
sentences.cn: 无线电报消息很简短。

sentences.en: This is a brief stop to take on passengers and water.
sentences.cn: 这是一次短暂停靠，上上客，加加水。

sentences.en: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.cn: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。
